name: @jasonscheirer/native-progress-bar
description: This module allows your Electron app to display native dialogs with progress bars in them on Windows and macOS.

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-native
scripts.build-native: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build
scripts.test: cd test && npm run start && cd -
